note.p: Death: Brook Street, Grosvenor Square, London (04 December 1792)
Education: MA (1742) Marischal College, Aberdeen; MD (Cambridge) by Royal mandate
Career: Army volunteer, served as Surgeon; settled in London as a Surgeon; wrote 'Fragmenta Chirurgica et medica' (1784)
References: William P D Wightman, 'Aberdeen University and the Royal Society' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 145-158, plate
